title: Home Page Load and Content Verification
description: Verify that the Home page loads correctly with introduction text, call-to-action buttons, and animated elements visible.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page URL
Check that the introduction text is visible and correct
Verify that call-to-action buttons are present and enabled
Confirm animated elements display as intended

title: About Section Content Display
description: Check that the About section displays background, education, and experience information accurately.

steps.description: Scroll or navigate to the About section
Verify visibility of personal background details
Confirm education and experience information are correctly displayed
Ensure no broken text or missing sections

title: Skills Section Display and Accuracy
description: Verify that the Skills section lists all key technologies and technical competencies properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Skills section
Check that all expected skill items are displayed
Confirm correct headings and descriptions for each skill
Validate responsiveness and layout on different screen sizes

title: Projects Section Project Cards and Links
description: Ensure each project card renders correctly with accurate descriptions, technology stacks, live demo via mobile emulator, and GitHub links.

steps.description: Navigate to the Projects section
Verify the number of project cards matches the data source
Confirm each card displays the correct project title, description, and technology stack
Check that live demo opens inside the interactive mobile emulator
Validate that GitHub links open the correct repositories in a new tab

title: Interactive Mobile Emulator Functionality
description: Validate the mobile emulator loads correctly and integrated apps like Camera, Photos, Play Store, Settings, and Clock function interactively.

steps.description: Access the mobile emulator within the Projects section
Confirm the emulator interface and controls are visible and functional
Open the Camera app and test photo capture and video recording features
Verify flash control, zoom, timer, and grid overlay functionality
Open Photos app and verify gallery displays captured photos with date grouping and search
Open Play Store app and test app listings, search, categories, and app details
Open Settings app and verify navigation through sub-menus
Open Clock app and test alarm, world clock, timer, and stopwatch features

title: Contact Form Submission and Firebase Integration
description: Test that the contact form collects user input, validates it, and successfully sends messages to Firebase backend.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Fill the form with valid name, email, subject, and message
Submit the contact form
Check for successful submission confirmation message
Verify submitted data is stored in Firebase database

title: Contact Form Validation and Error Handling
description: Validate that form input fields enforce required constraints and proper error messages display for invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Submit form with empty required fields
Verify that appropriate error messages display for empty fields
Input invalid email format and attempt submission
Check that email format error message is shown

title: Resume Download Functionality
description: Verify that the Resume section provides a functional download link for the CV file that correctly triggers download.

steps.description: Navigate to Resume section
Click the resume download link or button
Check that browser initiates download of the correct CV file
Validate the downloaded file is not corrupted and opens properly

title: Navigation Bar Links and Smooth Scrolling
description: Verify that all navigation bar links lead to the correct page sections with smooth scrolling effect and responsive functioning.

steps.description: On desktop, click each navigation link
Confirm page scrolls smoothly to the corresponding section
Switch to mobile view and trigger navigation menu
Click each navigation link in mobile menu
Verify smooth scrolling and correct destination navigation

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle and Persistence
description: Validate the theme toggle button switches between dark and light modes and user preference is saved and persists across sessions using localStorage.

steps.description: Locate and click the theme toggle button
Observe UI changes reflecting dark or light theme instantly
Refresh or reopen the browser tab
Confirm previously selected theme is preserved and applied
Check localStorage contains correct theme preference key and value

title: Responsive Design Across Devices and Browsers
description: Check that the entire portfolio website is visually consistent and fully functional across major browsers and on desktop and mobile devices with responsive layout adjustments.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari
Verify visual consistency and full functionality
Open the website on mobile devices: Android, iOS, different screen sizes
Confirm all sections render properly with no layout breakages
Test menu toggles and interactive elements respond correctly on touch

title: Projects Section Link Validation
description: Ensure all external links in Projects section including live demos and GitHub repositories open correctly and do not lead to errors or broken pages.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects section
Click on live demo links and verify emulator launches the project as expected
Click GitHub links on project cards
Confirm links open in new tab with correct repository page and no error

title: Mobile Emulator App Crash and Error Handling
description: Test the mobile emulator and integrated apps handle invalid user inputs or rapid sequential actions gracefully without crashing.

steps.description: Open mobile emulator and switch rapidly between apps
Check that no crashes or unresponsive states occur
Try invalid input on apps where applicable (e.g., search with special characters in Play Store)
Verify app handles invalid input with friendly messages or no error
